&lt;div id=&quot;mainpage_topbox&quot;&gt;
&lt;div id=&quot;mainpage_pagetitle&quot;&gt;'''Welcome to the SuiteCRM Wiki '''&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;div class=&quot;mainpage_boxcontents&quot;&gt;&lt;div id=&quot;mf-intro&quot;&gt;
This is the wiki for SuiteCRM which contains many guides, FAQ's, information about future releases and support options. Use the links to the left to navigate through the SuiteCRM wiki. 
&lt;br&gt;
In the versions section, you will find documentation on previously released and current versions of SuiteCRM. There will be details such as when it was last released and the support for that version.
&lt;br&gt;
You will find all User Guides for the custom modules inside SuiteCRM within the User Guides section. 
&lt;br&gt;
You'll find some content translated into other languages, but the primary documentation language is English.
&lt;br&gt;
For questions, advice and support about SuiteCRM see the [https://suitecrm.com/index.php?option=com_kunena&amp;view=category&amp;Itemid=1137&amp;layout=list support forums].&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;
&lt;/div&gt;

&lt;hr&gt;

[19.01.2015]SuiteCRM 7.1.5 features many bug fixes and addresses important security issues.

SugarCRM version updated to 6.5.20

This update addresses some important Security issues.
&lt;hr&gt;

[25.09.2014] SuiteCRM 7.1.4 has now been released. 7.1.4 features important security fixes to both the SugarCRM CE core(upgraded to 6.5.18 latest release) and QuickCRM.

There are many bug fixes to several modules within SuiteCRM, and some minor enhancements. Please see the release notes for a full list of bug fixes.
&lt;hr&gt;

[13.08.2014] SuiteCRM 7.1.3 has now been released. 7.1.3 features many bug fixes to several modules within SuiteCRM, and some minor enhancements. Please see the release notes for a full list of bug fixes.
&lt;hr&gt;

[07.07.2014] SuiteCRM 7.1.2 has now been released. 7.1.2 features important security updates for the SugarCRM base and many bug fixes have been implemented. Please see the release notes for a full list of bug fixes.
&lt;hr&gt;

[04.04.2014] SuiteCRM 7.1.1 has been released and is now available to download and upgrade from previous SuiteCRM versions.
&lt;hr&gt;

[31.03.2014] The long awaited SuiteCRM 7.1 is now available

This release packs in many new features, most notably the many enhancements to workflow, the new lucene powered search, (to enable see AOD in the admin panel), the multi tabbed homepage, the ability to filter the history sub-panel and more

A Full list of new features and bug fixed will be available soon

Go to the download section to get the full package or appropriate upgrade.

Thanks to everyone who has contributed to the project so far, if you have something to contribute be it a Bug Fix, a Language Pack or a New Feature, then check out the project on [http://github.com/salesagility/suitecrm GitHub].
&lt;hr&gt;

[23.01.2014] SuiteCRM 7.1 will be released in Q1 of 2014. SuiteCRM 7.1 will contain a host of new functionality and features such as Social integration, improvements to AOW and more.
&lt;hr&gt;

[21.01.2014] SuiteCRM 7.0.2 has been released which has several new additions and many bugfixes. We thank both the community who highlighted and/or posted solutions for these bugs and also to our contributors who helped work towards new additions and the resolution of bugs via our SuiteCRM repository on GitHub [https://github.com/salesagility/SuiteCRM] .
&lt;hr&gt;

[14.01.2014] SuiteCRM 7.0.2 and 7.1 are due for release this month. 7.0.2 is a bugfix release with fixes to languages, the theme and modules such as AOS/AOW/AOP and AOR. 7.1 is a minor release with new features such as OpenMeetings/Social Integration and more...
